B

Ball - Class in <Unnamed>
The Ball class encapsulates the basic data and behaviors to model the ball within the brick breaker game.
Ball() - Constructor for class Ball
Creates a default Ball object with an initial location of (100, 100) and an initial trajectory of 3 pixels in both x and y dimensions.
Ball(int, int) - Constructor for class Ball
Creates a Ball object with a custom initial location and a default trajectory of 3 pixels in both the x and y dimensions.
bounceHorizontal() - Method in class Ball
Causes this Ball's current horizontal trajectory to reverse direction by 180 degrees.
bounceVertical() - Method in class Ball
Causes this Ball's current vertical trajectory to reverse direction by 180 degrees.
Brick - Class in <Unnamed>
This class is used to store state information corresponding to a single Brick within the brick breaker game model.
Brick(int, int) - Constructor for class Brick
Creates a basic Brick object at a specified position.
Brick(int, int, int) - Constructor for class Brick
Creates a custom Brick object at a specified position with a specified strength.
BrickBreakerApp - Class in <Unnamed>
This class is a small stub class that is solely responsible for kicking off the BrickBreaker graphical user interface which is included through a pre-compiled library.
BrickBreakerApp() - Constructor for class BrickBreakerApp
